articles.title: Congratulations to President-Elect of Albania
articles.content:
Congratulations to President-Elect of Albania
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Ilir Rexhep Meta on his election as president of Albania.
					 Kim in the message wished the president-elect success in his work for the country's prosperity, expressing the belief that the long-standing relations of friendship between the two countries would expand on good terms in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Pays Call on Mauritanian FM
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Pays Call on Mauritanian FM
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK who is leading the Foreign Ministry delegation on a visit to Mauritania, paid a courtesy call on Isselkou Ould Ahmed Izid Bih, minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mauritania, on April 27.
					 Sin referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung paid an official visit to the country in May 1975 and thus contributed to the development of the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties and to the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in the efforts to building a socialist power, united close around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He underlined the need to further expand and develop the historic and long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 The minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mauritania recalled that the President positively supported the Mauritanian people's struggle to build a new society after the independence of their country. And the minister expressed the will to further strengthen in mutual interests the cooperation and coordination between the two countries, peace-loving states desirous of independent development, although they are far away from each other geographically.

articles.title: DPRK Will Bolster Nuclear Deterrence at Maximum Speed: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Will Bolster Nuclear Deterrence at Maximum Speed: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in a statement Monday said that the touch-and-go situation, created on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. DPRK-targeted joint military exercises for aggression and the military threat, has left a serious lesson.
					 The confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. has lasted for more than half a century but the U.S. aggression hysteria has never reached such a height and the situation on the Korean peninsula has never inched close to the brink of nuclear war as in the period of the recent drills, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula proves once again that the U.S. is the chieftain of aggression and war, and harasser of peace who is escalating tension and that the DPRK was just and far-sighted when it opted for bolstering its powerful nuclear deterrence for self-defence under the uplifted banner of the simultaneous development of the two fronts.
					
					 If the DPRK had not had access to the powerful nuclear force and had not gotten itself ready to counter the U.S. and its vassal forces' provocation with merciless military counteraction, the U.S. would have committed without hesitation the same brigandish aggression act in Korea as what it committed against other countries.
					
					 In order to check such high-handed and arbitrary practices and defend the sovereignty and the right to existence of the country and the nation, and to contribute to regional peace and security and genuine international justice, the DPRK has been bolstering its nuclear deterrence despite manifold difficulties.
					
					 The recent confrontation with the U.S. reminds us once again of the iron truth that one has to build one's own strength in order to defend oneself from the whirlwind of history in which it is neither aided nor sympathized by anyone.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is kicking up the overall racket for sanctions and pressure against the DPRK, pursuant to its new DPRK policy called "maximum pressure and engagement", the DPRK will speed up at the maximum pace the measure for bolstering its nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to respond to any option taken by the U.S., and unless it withdraws its hideous hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat and blackmail, the DPRK will continue to bolster its military capabilities for self-defence and preemptive nuclear attack with the nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 The DPRK's measures for bolstering the nuclear force to the maximum will be taken in a consecutive and successive way at any moment and any place decided by its supreme leadership.

articles.title: Press Release of North Side Preparatory Committee for Pan-National Conference
articles.content:
Press Release of North Side Preparatory Committee for Pan-National Conference
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The North Side Preparatory Committee for the Pan-National Conference for Peace and Reunification of the Country and Development of North-south Relations made public a press released on Monday.
					 According to it, a ceremony for inaugurating the preparatory committee of workers organizations in the north and the south for the Pan-National Conference took place in the north and the south of Korea on the 127th May Day.
					
					 Attending the ceremony in Pyongyang were officials of the C.C., General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), members of its reunification committee and delegates of industrial and regional trade unions, including the C.C., Metal and Machine Trade Union of Korea, the C.C., Education and Culture Trade Union of Korea, the C.C., Transport and Fishery Trade Union of Korea, the C.C., Mining and Power Trade Union of Korea and the Pyongyang City Committee of the GFTUK.
					
					 After speeches were made there, solidarity letters from the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea were read out.
					
					 Then, a preparatory committee of workers organizations in the north and the south for the Pan-National Conference was formed with the chairmen of workers organizations in the north and the south as co-chairmen.  And it discussed an action program to enhance the vanguard role of workers organizations in the north and the south in ensuring the Pan-National Conference in close touch with the north, south and overseas side preparatory committees for the Conference.
					
					 The ceremony adopted an inaugural declaration of the preparatory committee of workers organizations in the north and the south for the Conference which was agreed between the workers organizations in the north and the south.
					
					 In the declaration the workers organizations in the north and the south said that the Pan-National Conference would become a significant occasion in implementing the north-south agreements to improve the north-south relations and open a new heyday of peace of the country and its independent reunification, underscoring the need to orient all exchanges and solidarity activities to be conducted between the workers organizations in the north and the south this year to holding the Conference.
					
					 Stressing that they would launch proactive and staunch activities to strengthen the forces for great national unity and check the war and confrontation moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad, the declaration expressed the firm resolution of the workers in the north and the south, the eldest son of the nation and engine of independent reunification, to take the lead in implementing the north-south declarations and holding the Pan-National Conference.
					
					 Meanwhile, a ceremony of the preparatory committee of the workers organizations in the south and the north for the Pan-National Conference took place in Seoul with delegates of organizations of all social standings attending, under the sponsorship of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea.
					
					 A solidarity letter from the GFTUK Central Committee was read out at the ceremony.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Youths in Japan Pays Tribute to Great Leaders
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Youths in Japan Pays Tribute to Great Leaders
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay homage to them on Monday.
					 The delegation laid bunches of flowers at the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Health Workers Association in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Health Workers Association in Japan Arrives
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Health Workers Association in Japan headed by Vice-Chairperson Kang Kyong Bu arrived here on Monday to take part in the 19th Pyongyang Medical Science Symposium of Koreans at Home and Abroad.

articles.title: DPRK Women Handball Players Return with Gold Medal
articles.content:
DPRK Women Handball Players Return with Gold Medal
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The women handball players of the DPRK returned home on Monday after taking part in the 2017 IHF Trophy Tournament Asia held in Thailand from April 24 to 28. 
					 The tournament brought together players of four countries including the DPRK, Uzbekistan and India.
					
					 The DPRK women players won a gold medal after defeating their rivals.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark 127th May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark 127th May Day
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex on Monday to mark the 127th May Day, international holiday of the working people in the world.
					 Present at the meeting were officials concerned, officials of the Complex and other officials and working people in Anju City.
					
					 Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He warmly congratulated all the working people of socialist Korea including Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class upon authorization by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un of the party, state and army.
					
					 Thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, our working people have successfully carried out their missions and duties in the drive for the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution and socialism, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung built the best socialist system where the working people became the master on this land and opened up a new era of history, the Juche era for achieving independence of the popular masses by depending on their boundless strength.
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that May Day was marked as the revolutionary holiday of the workers and all other working people as required by the era and the developing revolution, strengthening the single-minded unity of our revolutionary ranks in every way.
					
					 The flames of the industrial revolution in the new century, torch of Songgang, torch of Kangson and flames of Hamnam raged more furiously during the grave period when the imperialists had gone to extremes in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and the dawn of a socialist power broke. All these would be unthinkable without the outstanding idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The great leaders put forward working people as master of the country and the revolution and victoriously led the revolution and construction depending on their inexhaustible strength. The history of the revolutionary leadership by the great leaders has been now steadily carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Last year Kim Jong Un initiated the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and congresses of other working people's organizations and sent his letters to the participants in the congresses to provide the important programmes for all the working people of the DPRK including workers in the drive for building of a socialist power.
					
					 Thanks to his loving care and deep trust, our workers received the precious honor of being the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class and the people of Kangwon Province became the indomitable fighters, creators of the spirit of Kangwon Province.
					
					 All the working people should unite close around the Party with a single mind and the same intention and uphold the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un, bearing in mind the truth that single-minded unity guarantees invincible might of Korean-style socialism.

articles.title: May Day Significantly Marked across Country
articles.content:
May Day Significantly Marked across Country
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- All the people in the DPRK significantly enjoyed May Day, international holiday of the working people in the world.
					 Colorful celebrations took place in Pyongyang and other parts of the country.
					
					 Art performances by national art troupes in Pyongyang and sports and amusement games of working people took place at theatres, parks and pleasure grounds here. 
					
					 A concert was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre and a musical dance and poem "'Arirang' Story" at the Ponghwa Art Theatre. 
					
					 Multifarious pieces including physical acrobatics, funny acrobatics, illusionary jugglery and other forms of jugglery were put on the stages of the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the Magic Theatre of the National Acrobatic Troupe.
					
					 Pieces of acrobatics and juggleries reflecting thoughts and feelings and desire of the Korean people were put on the stage at the Mangyongdae Amusement Park to please the audience.
					
					 Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe and the National Folk Art Troupe gave performances at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park and the plaza of South Gate at the foot of Mt Taesong. 
					
					 Sports games of builders in the capital of Pyongyang took place at the Kim Il Sung Stadium. 
					
					 Multifarious art performances and amusement games were held at factories, enterprises and cooperative farms across the country.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Enjoy May Day together with Working People
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Enjoy May Day together with Working People
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials significantly enjoyed May Day together with working people across the country.
					 Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam and other senior party and state officials, vice-premiers of the Cabinet, officials of the party and power bodies went to the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, the State Academy of Sciences, the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, the Chollima Steel Complex, the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill, the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City and other institutions, industrial establishments and farms to congratulate workers, agricultural workers and intellectuals on May Day.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling great leaders and mosaics depicting them before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Going round the revolutionary museums, rooms dedicated to the history of the relevant units and other places, they felt once again the undying exploits of the peerlessly great men who turned the country into an invincible power.
					
					 The senior Party and state officials and other officials across the country met with innovators creating labor feats and encouraged their successes, listening to their stories about the great upsurge and great innovations on the fronts for building a socialist power.
					
					 Together with the working people they conducted colorful sports and amusement games such as tug-of-war and enjoyed art performances.
					
					 They called upon all the working people to faithfully uphold the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and achieve a series of successes with the might of self-reliance and self-development and glorify the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners as the one of victors.

articles.title: Peerlessly Great Men's Loving Care for Working People
articles.content:
Peerlessly Great Men's Loving Care for Working People
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK are celebrating May Day, recalling the loving care shown by the peerlessly great men for the working people.
					 President Kim Il Sung put forward the working people, who had been subjected to exploitation and oppression in the past, as the most valuable beings in the world.
					
					 He took part in the Pyongyang mass rally marking the first May Day after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule and called on all the working people to turn out in the struggle for building a new country.
					
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953), he issued the order of the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army "On the occasion of May Day" to inspire workers and other people with firm confidence in victory.
					
					 Thanks to his loving care for the working people and trust in them, they could bring about the era of Chollima in the DPRK to the wonder of the world.
					
					 Under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, they amassed for a large unit to reliably push forward the building of a socialist power.
					
					 He invited workers in the field of metallurgical industry and relevant industrial establishments to the May Day celebration and enjoyed the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl" together with them in Juche 98 (2009).
					
					 Today, the loving care of the great leaders for working people is being creditably carried on by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He visited Kangsong Service Complex on May Day, 2012 and left a legendary anecdote relative to his loving care for working people. He also went round the newly-built workers' hostel of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill in April 2014 and took measures to hold a grand banquet for its workers at the hostel in celebration of May Day.
					
					 Indeed, the loving care shown by the great persons of Mt Paektu for the working people encourages them to perform great feats in the on-going drive for creating Mallima speed.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Fully Displaying Heroic Spirit of Korean Working People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Fully Displaying Heroic Spirit of Korean Working People
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to the 127th May Day, international holiday of the working people in the world.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is the great teacher and tender-hearted father of the working people of Juche Korea as he has trained them into ardent patriots and performers of heroic feats, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 He put forward the Korean workers as the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class and has shown warm care for them so that they can fully display the might of hammer, sickle and brush. He saw to it that in the wake of the historic 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, congresses of working people's organizations were convened to strengthen all of them into the organizations of the leader and put the dignity and honor of the socialist working people on the highest stage.
					
					 His wise leadership serves as the motive force that helps train the Korean working people into those strong in idea and faith, staunch fighters with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development weathering all sorts of ordeals optimistically in reliance on their own efforts, and powerful creators achieving a high level of civilization and prosperity overtaking the world.
					
					 The present times is a fresh era of great prosperity of the Workers' Party of Korea to realize the behests of the great leaders and win the final victory in the building of a socialist power by advancing in the speed of Mallima. This great era of Juche Korea displaying its might under the guidance of the Supreme Leader calls on all the working people to devotedly work for prosperity of the country with strong faith, high creative capability and ardent patriotism like the Chollima riders.
					
					 All the working people should fully display the popular heroism in the worthwhile general offensive to accomplish the socialist cause under the grand blueprint unfolded at the Seventh WPK Congress and thus exalt the honor of Mallima riders, frontrunners of the Mallima movement.

articles.title: Capitalism Bound to Go to Ruin due to Struggle of Popular Masses: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Capitalism Bound to Go to Ruin due to Struggle of Popular Masses: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday runs an article to May Day.
					 The article says:
					
					 May Day is related to the large demonstration of workers in Chicago, the U.S., in demand of 8-hour work. The struggle jolted not only the society in the U.S. but also the whole capitalist society as it was an eruption of pent-up resentment and anger of the exploited working masses against the unlimited exploitation and oppression of capitalists.
					
					 One century and dozens of years have passed since then. However, the wishes of the working masses to protect genuine labor rights and right to existence and enjoy independent and creative life have not come true yet.
					
					 Struggle for existence by jungle law prevails as the main law in socio-economic life, a tiny handful of privileged classes lawfully exploit majority of the working masses in the capitalist society owing to the inevitable systematic contradictions. It is because of the imperialist reactionaries challenging to the developing era and history with more cunning method vociferating about the eternity of capitalism.
					
					 The constructive ills of unpopular capitalist economic system are a factor threatening the vital rights of working people at every moment.
					
					 Labor rights are the most elementary rights for existence of human being.
					
					 But in the capitalist countries, the number of people wandering streets without jobs is increasing as the days go by.
					
					 Where there is exploitation and oppression, there will be resistance.
					
					 Capitalism is finding itself in deeper ruin owing to the ever-worsening politico-economic crisis resulting from its self-constructive contradiction and the unpopular exploiting system in face of the struggle of the broad working masses.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the way-out of the working masses of the world lies in the struggle and the doom of capitalism is inevitable.

articles.title: 23rd All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
23rd All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The 23rd all-people action was reportedly launched in Seoul of south Korea on April 29 under the sponsorship of the People's Emergency Action for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime.
					 Attending it were 50 000 people including members of civic and public organizations and citizens.
					
					 Earlier, they held meetings in demand of the probe into truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, punishment of those responsible, and wage hike.
					
					 Then a candlelight rally took place. The ralliers announced a written demand for 100 reforms in ten-odd fields such as north-south relations and freedom of speech.
					
					 At the end of the rally, the participants marched toward the office building of the "prime minister" and the U.S. embassy.
					
					 In front of the office building of the "prime minister" the demonstrators strongly urged the south Korean puppet authorities to withdraw the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Protest against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Protest against THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany and the European Regional Headquarters of the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on April 28 made public a statement in denunciation of the illegal deployment of THAAD by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					 Days ago the U.S. forces suddenly deployed "X-band" radar and parts of THAAD at Songju Golf Links to practically operate them, according to the decision made by Park Geun Hye last year, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The heroes of the candlelight actions and overseas Koreans strongly demand that the new "government" of south Korea show it is no longer shackled to the U.S. by boldly requesting the abolishment of the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty", model of inequality, challenging to the threat and pressure of the Trump administration.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Il Sung Introduced in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association posted the brief biography of President Kim Il Sung on its website on April 13 to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 The website carried a photo of the President.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Albania
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de Albania
Pyongyang, primero de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el 30 de abril un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de la Republica de Albania, Ilir Rexhep Meta.
					Convencido de que las largas relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran a favor de los intereses de los dos pueblos, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en los trabajos del destinatario por la prosperidad de Albania.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana se reune con el canciller mauritano
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana se reune con el canciller mauritano
Pyongyang, primero de mayo (ACNC) -- El vicecanciller Sin Hong Chol, quien se encuentra de visita en la Republica Islamica de Mauritania encabezando la delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo el 27 de abril una visita de cortesia al ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperacion del pais africano, Isselkou Ould Ahmed Izid Bih.
					El vicecanciller coreano recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung visito oficialmente en mayo de 1975 a Mauritania haciendo aporte imperecedero al desarrollo de relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Se refirio a los exitos logrados en la construccion de potencia socialista por el ejercito y pueblo coreanos, unidos monoliticamente en torno al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, y enfatizo la necesidad de ampliar y desarrollar aun mas las historicas y tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion.
					
					El ministro anfitrion apunto que el Presidente Kim Il Sung apoyo en todo lo posible la lucha de Mauritania por construir una nueva sociedad despues de su independencia.
					
					Expreso la voluntad de fortalecer conforme a los intereses mutuos la cooperacion y coordinacion como Estados pacifistas y aspirantes al desarrollo independiente, aunque ambos paises se encuentran muy lejos en lo geografico.

articles.title: Se acelerara mas el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear, enfatiza el vocero de MINREX de RPDC
articles.content:
Se acelerara mas el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear, enfatiza el vocero de MINREX de RPDC
Pyongyang, primero de mayo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia primero una declaracion destacando que quedo unas lecciones serias la situacion muy aguda y tirante creada en la Peninsula Coreana debido a los ejercicios militares conjuntos de caracter agresivo y la amenaza militar de Estados Unidos contra la RPDC.
					Durante mas de medio siglo en que ha perdurado la confrontacion entre la RPDC y EE.UU., habia llegado tan extremadamente la furia de EE.UU. de agresion anti-RPDC ni llegado como esta vez la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de la provocacion de guerra nuclear, subrayo el portavoz y prosiguio:
					
					La realidad de la Peninsula Coreana demuestra que EE.UU. es el caudillo de la agresion y guerra, perturbador de la paz y autor de la agravacion de tension y comprueba otra vez cuan justa y clarividente es nuestra opcion de centuplicar el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa bajo la bandera de la linea de desarrollo paralelo.
					
					Si no tuvieramos las potentes fuerzas armadas nucleares ni hicieramos preparativos militares para responder a la provocacion de EE.UU. y las fuerzas satelites, el imperio yanqui cometiera sin vacilacion alguna el bandidesco acto de agresion contra la RPDC, como lo hicieron en otros paises.
					
					Para detener tal coaccion y arbitrariedad, defender la soberania y el derecho a existencia del pais y la nacion y para contribuir a la paz y seguridad de la region y a la realizacion de la verdadera justicia internacional, consolidamos el disuasivo nuclear superando todas las dificultades.
					
					A traves de la reciente batalla de confrontacion con EE.UU., volvemos a guardar profundamente el principio de que hay que tener las poderosas fuerzas propias para defender a si mismo en el torbellino de la historia en que no existe un apoyo ni compasion de alguien.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. se dedica solo a la campana de sancion y presion total contra la RPDC recurriendo a la recien inventada politica sobre la RPDC llamada como "maxima presion y intervencion", aceleraremos con maxima velocidad las medidas por fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					Estamos totalmente listos para responder con gusto a cualquier opcion de EE.UU. y seguiremos mejorando el poderio de autodefensa nacional y la capacidad de ataque preventivo apoyada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares mientras que EE.UU. no abandone su atroz politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra la RPDC.
					
					Nuestras medidas para mejorar las fuerzas armadas nucleares se tomaran de manera multiple y sucesiva en cualquier momento y cualquier lugar decididos por nuestra Suprema Direccion.

articles.title: Comite norteno para conferencia pannacional publica comunicado oficial
articles.content:
Comite norteno para conferencia pannacional publica comunicado oficial
Pyongyang, primero de mayo (ACNC) -- El comite preparatorio de la parte Norte para la conferencia pannacional por la paz y la reunificacion de la patria y el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas hizo publico hoy el siguiente comunicado oficial:
					En ocasion del 127o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores, tuvo lugar en el Norte y el Sur de Corea la ceremonia constitucional del comite preparatorio de entidades obreras Norte-Sur para la conferencia pannacional por la paz y la reunificacion de la patria y el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					En el acto efectuado en Pyongyang participaron los funcionarios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, los integrantes del Comite por la Reunificacion y los delegados de los sindicatos industriales y regionales tales como los comites centrales del Sindicato Metalurgico y de Maquinaria, el de Educacion y Cultura, el de Transporte y Pesqueria y el de Mineria y Energia, y el Comite de la FGSC en la ciudad de Pyongyang. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos y se dio lectura al mensaje de solidaridad enviado por la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y la Federacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos.
					
					Luego, quedo organizado el comite preparatorio de entidades obreras Norte-Sur para la conferencia pannacional con los presidentes de entidades obreras de ambas partes como copresidentes. Y se discutio el rumbo de las actividades encaminadas a elevar el papel vanguardista de las entidades obreras de ambas partes, en estrecha colaboracion con los comites preparatorios norteno, sureno y ultramarino, para lograr la apertura de la conferencia pannacional. 
					
					Y fue aprobada la declaracion constitucional acordada por las entidades obreras del Norte y el Sur. 
					
					En ese documento, ellas afirmaron que la conferencia pannacional sera un motivo significativo para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y abrir una nueva era de prosperidad para la paz y la reunificacion independiente del pais mediante la ejecucion de los acuerdos Norte-Sur y expusieron la voluntad de orientar a la apertura de esa cita todos los intercambios y actividades solidarias entre si. 
					
					Senalando que dinamizaran con tenacidad las actividades ejecutivas para incrementar las fuerzas por la gran unidad nacional y frenar las maniobras belicas de las fuerzas internas y externas opositoras a la reunificacion, manifestaron la firme decision de los obreros de ambas partes de tomar la delantera en la implementacion de las declaraciones Norte-Sur y la apertura de la conferencia pannacional cumpliendo su papel de primogenitos de la nacion y locomotoras de reunificacion independiente.
					
					Por otra parte, tuvo lugar el mismo acto en Seul bajo auspicios de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y la Federacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y con la presencia de los representantes de las entidades de diferentes sectores. 
					
					En esa ocasion fue leida la nota de solidaridad enviada por el Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 127o aniversario del Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 127o aniversario del Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, primero de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung el acto central dedicado al 127o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores.
					A la ocasion asistieron los funcionarios de la rama interesada, el complejo arriba referido y la ciudad de Anju y los trabajadores ciudadanos.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho.
					
					Por el encargo de Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el orador felicito calurosamente a todos los trabajadores de la Corea socialista incluyendo la clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Gracias al gran lider y gran dirigente, los trabajadores coreanos vinieron cumpliendo magnificamente con su mision y deber en la lucha por adelantar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la socialista, recordo y continuo:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung construyo en esta tierra el mas ventajoso socialismo donde el pueblo trabajador es el dueno y abrio nueva epoca de la historia, la del Juche en que se realiza la independencia de las masas populares basandose en las fuerzas inagotables del pueblo trabajador.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo conmemorar el Primero de Mayo como la fiesta revolucionaria de todos los trabajadores incluyendo los obreros conforme a la epoca y revolucion en desarrollo, consolidando asi la unidad monolitica de nuestras filas revolucionarias.
					
					En el periodo riguroso cuando se llegaron al climax las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC de los imperialistas, se produjo vigorosamente la revolucion industrial de nuevo siglo, se avivaron la antorcha de Songgang, la de Kangson y las llamaradas de Hamnam, adelantando la construccion de la potencia socialista. Esta realidad no podemos pensarla al margen de la destacada idea y direccion del Dirigente.
					
					Gracias al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, hoy tambien continua la historia de la direccion revolucionaria del Presidente y el Dirigente quienes al presentar a los trabajadores como duenos del pais y revolucion, guiaron a la victoria la revolucion y construccion apoyando a las fuerzas inagotables de ellos.
					
					En el ano pasado, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un tuvo iniciativa de convocar el VII Congreso de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea y otras conferencias de las organizaciones de masas y envio a los participantes en las dichas reuniones los mensajes, guias programaticas a ser mantenidos firmemente por todos los trabajadores en la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					Gracias al amor y confianza del Mariscal, los obreros coreanos disfrutaron del digno titulo de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y los habitantes de la provincia de Kangwon se crecieron como combatientes indoblegables y creadores del espiritu de la provincia de Kangwon.
					
					Todos los trabajadores deben apoyar con fidelidad la idea y direccion del Mariscal unidos firmemente con un alma y proposito en torno del Partido, guardando en el profundo de corazon la filosofia de que en la unidad compacta de todo el pueblo hay el poderio irrefrenable del socialismo al estilo coreano.
